title: Here's what the next three months of winter weather will look like in Ontario
description: November was a wild month for Ontario weather-wise, with colder-than-expected temperatures and even a few surprise snow showers, and now a new forecast is offering a first look at what the next three months of winter have in store. Environment Canada released…
